idea:
Bluebrahma Clean Energy Solutions Private Limited is a Private Limited company incorporated under the Companies Act 2013 on 8th November, 2021 having its registered office in Gut No. 48, Village Dahyane, P.O. Paregaon, Tal. Chandwad, Nashik – 422215, Maharashtra.

The Company will mainly engage in the production of Ethanol, today’s largest volume biofuel, which is produced through a biochemical conversion process.

Benefits for Ethanol Production & Vision of the Company

• Green Energy

• Environmental sustainability with reduction of CO2 emission

• Positive Energy Balance

• Cost effective and High-performance alternative fuel

• Create employment opportunities in rural and backward areas

• Give boost to agriculture sector of the country

• Reduce dependency on import for energy requirements

Govt. of India is also promoting the use of ethanol, Bioethanol and other alternative fuels and taking various initiatives under ease of doing business and achieve the objectives of Atmanirbhar Bharat initiatives.

The Government has been implementing Ethanol Blended Petrol (EBP) Programme wherein Oil Marketing Companies (OMCs) sell petrol blended with ethanol up to 10%, to promote the use of alternative and environment friendly fuels and also announced “Ethanol Procurement Policy on a long-term basis under EBP Programme.
name: BLUEBRAHMA CLEAN ENERGY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our vision is simple: make it easy to be ecofriendly with innovative products in reusable packaging that are convenient, effective and affordable. Our products will help to eliminate over 1 billion single-use plastic bottles from landfills and oceans in times to come. To gain national and international recognition for Low Cost Quality Products, cost leadership, Product innovation and Customer Satisfaction. CHEMICALITY INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, (CIPL) CIPL is aiming into Manufacturing and Distribution of various Surface Cleaning and Kitchen Cleaning products spread across different variants in TABLET Form of varied types and uses as mentioned below;

Surface Cleaning Tablet: For Industrial Use• For Commercial / Office use• For Residential Use• 2. Kitchen Surface Cleaning Tablet 3. Bathroom Cleaning Tablet 4. Toilet Cleaning Tablet 5. Human Hygiene Products Hand Wash• Body Wash• Shower Gel• Shampoo• And other allied products•

Fill your exsisting Bottle with water; drop in your cleaning or soap tablet, and start cleaning in minutes, no shaking or stirring required.

All these products are targeted to be sold to Distributors and Dealers across India.  company would also sale its products through Online E-commerce portal and through digital marketing 

CHEMICALITY INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED intends to manufacture and sale varied range of Surface Cleaning and Human Hygiene Products from its state of art manufacturing proposed to be based at Vadodara gujarat.

As the product is new in its segment, presently there are very few competitors in market and inhouse Manufacturing further shall open the direct sales and export opportunities to newer geographical areas including direct exports. This shall have very positive impact on sales and margins of the company in longer run
name: CHEMICALITY INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
